import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Récupération des avions"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/avions"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
</MethodEndpoint>

Retourne les informations des avions selon différents critères de filtrage. Sans paramètres, retourne tous les avions.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{
    "name": "immatriculation",
    "in": "query",
    "description": "Immatriculation de l'avion à récupérer",
    "required": false,
    "schema": {
      "type": "string"
    }
  },
  {
    "name": "marque",
    "in": "query",
    "description": "Filtrer par marque d'avion",
    "required": false,
    "schema": {
      "type": "string"
    }
  },
  {
    "name": "model",
    "in": "query",
    "description": "Filtrer par modèle d'avion",
    "required": false,
    "schema": {
      "type": "string"
    }
  },
  {
    "name": "hangarID",
    "in": "query",
    "description": "Filtrer par ID du hangar",
    "required": false,
    "schema": {
      "type": "integer"
    }
  },
  {
    "name": "fuelCapacity",
    "in": "query",
    "description": "Filtrer par capacité en carburant",
    "required": false,
    "schema": {
      "type": "number"
    }
  },
  {
    "name": "fuelLevel",
    "in": "query",
    "description": "Filtrer par niveau de carburant actuel",
    "required": false,
    "schema": {
      "type": "number"
    }
  },
  {
    "name": "lastPilotID",
    "in": "query",
    "description": "Filtrer par ID du dernier pilote",
    "required": false,
    "schema": {
      "type": "integer"
    }
  },
  {
    "name": "lastRevision",
    "in": "query",
    "description": "Filtrer par date de dernière révision",
    "required": false,
    "schema": {
      "type": "string",
      "format": "date"
    }
  },
  {
    "name": "lastFlying",
    "in": "query",
    "description": "Filtrer par date du dernier vol",
    "required": false,
    "schema": {
      "type": "string",
      "format": "date"
    }
  },
  {
    "name": "commissioningDate",
    "in": "query",
    "description": "Filtrer par date de mise en service",
    "required": false,
    "schema": {
      "type": "string",
      "format": "date"
    }
  }]}
>
</ParamsDetails>

<StatusCodes
  responses={{
    "200": {
      "description": "Opération réussie",
      "content": {
        "application/json": {
          "schema": {
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
              "immatriculation": {
                "type": "string",
                "description": "Immatriculation de l'avion"
              },
              "marque": {
                "type": "string",
                "description": "Marque de l'avion"
              },
              "model": {
                "type": "string",
                "description": "Modèle de l'avion"
              },
              "fuelCapacity": {
                "type": "number",
                "description": "Capacité maximale en carburant"
              },
              "fuelLevel": {
                "type": "number",
                "description": "Niveau actuel de carburant"
              },
              "hangarID": {
                "type": "integer",
                "description": "Identifiant du hangar"
              },
              "commissioningDate": {
                "type": "string",
                "format": "date",
                "description": "Date de mise en service"
              }
            },
            "required": ["immatriculation", "marque", "model", "fuelCapacity", "hangarID", "commissioningDate"]
          }
        }
      }
    },
    "404": {
      "description": "Avion non trouvé"
    },
    "400": {
      "description": "Requête invalide"
    }
  }}
>
</StatusCodes>
